p: Various Pharmaceutical and Biotechnological companies such as Sanofi, Zydus Cadila, Codagenix, Serum Institute of India, Bharath Biotech, Inovio Pharmaceuticals & Beijing Advaccine Biotechnology, Sanofi & Translate Bio, Pfizer, Johnson & Johnson, GlaxoSmithKline (GSK), Commonwealth Serum Laboratories (CSL) and Seqirus have started the vaccine development programs in association with academic institutes, research centers and hospitals. Few of the novel vaccines showed positive results in preclinical trials and they are trying to push their products for clinical trials in the current year 2020 [ 175]. The list of the vaccines under clinical trials is represented in Table 7 .
